𒁕𒇻 da-ru
𒁕𒇻 draw (a needle or pin), water drawer, roam around, to move

𓍿 𓂋 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓀢 | complaint | critique criticize critic… ⇔ •recurse 𓂋 𓍿 𓂋 𓏏 𓀢 @ court
𓏏 𓍯 𓄿 𓀢 | appeal to (someone) | •tragen beantragen drag / take @ court

𐍄𐌹𐌿𐌷𐌰𐌽 ziehen “lead” take

𓊹𓊹𓊹 Dryhten "Lord" From Proto-Germanic *druhtinaz. Cognate with Old Frisian drochten, Old Saxon drohtin, Old High German truhtin, Old Norse dróttinn. *druhtiz band of troop, "director" drag duce ≠ *dʰrewgʰ Trug
